1.text: Grab 2 slices of your favorite bread.

2.text: Slide both slices into the same slot in your toaster.

3.text: Toast the bread for 30 to 60 seconds.

4.text: Grab your slices once they’re crisp.

5.text: Slather the inside of each slice with butter.

6.text: Stack your sandwich fillings on one of the slices.

7.text: Place the other slice of bread on top, soft-side down.

8.text: Cut your sandwich in half and enjoy!
